pkgmetadata.longdescription: Superpixel Image Segmentation // Image Segmentation using Superpixels, Affinity Propagation and Kmeans Clustering. The R code is based primarily on the article "Image Segmentation using SLIC Superpixels and Affinity Propagation Clustering, Bao Zhou, International Journal of Science and Research (IJSR), 2013" https://www.ijsr.net/archive/v4i4/SUB152869.pdf.
